entry.title: Optimization Methods Notes2
entry.content:
[Optimization Methods]——Notes 2

保凸运算

  • 交集：$S_1$ and $S_2$ are convex, then $S_1 \cap S_2$ is convex.

可拓展到多个：$\forall \alpha \in \cal A$,$S_{\alpha}$ is convex, then $\cap_{\alpha\in\cal A}S_{\alpha}$ is convex.

  • 子空间、仿射集合、凸锥的交集都是封闭的
  • 多面体是半空间和超平面的交集——是凸的
  • 半正定锥可表示为多个半空间的交集——是凸的

仿射函数

  • 仿射函数：函数$f:{\R}^n \to {\R}^m$是仿射的$\iff\iff$它是一个线性函数和常数的和

    若$S\subset {\R}^n$且 $S$是凸的，那么$S$在$f$下的象：$f(S)=\{f(x)|x\in S\}$是凸的

    $S$在$f$下的原象:$f^{-1}(S)=\{x|f(x)\in S\}$也是凸的

    • 伸缩

      $\alpha S = \{\alpha x| x\in S\}$

      • 若$S$为凸的，则$\alpha S$也是凸的

    • 平移

      $S+\alpha = \{x+\alpha|x\in S\}$

      • 若$S$为凸的，则$S+\alpha$也是凸的

    • 投影

      若$S\subset {\R}^m×{\R}^n$是凸集，那么$T=\{x_1\in {\R}^m|(x_1,x_2)\in S对于某些x_2\in{\R}^n\}$也是凸集

    • 两个集合的和

      $S_1+S_2=\{x+y|x\in S_1,y\in S_2\}$

      若$S_1,S_2$是凸的，则$S_1+S_2$也是凸的

    • 两个集合的直积或Cartesian乘积

      $S_1×S_2=\{(x_1,x_2)|x_1\in S_1,x_2\in S_2\}$

      若$S_1,S_2$是凸的，则$S_1×S_2$也是凸的

      将线性函数$f(x_1,x_2)$作用于$S_1×S_2$,则可得到$S_1+S_2$

    • 两个集合的部分和

      $S_1,S_2\in {\R}^n×{\R}^m$,$S=\{(x,y_1+y_2)|(x,y_1)\in S_1, (x,y_2)\in S_2\}$

      若$S_1,S_2$是凸的，那么$S$也是凸的

      m = 0:两个集合的交集

    n = 0: 两个集合的和

    • 多面体

      • 非负象限${\R}^n_+$：具有非负分量的点的集合$\to$是多面体也是锥

      多面体:$\{x|Ax\preceq b, Cx = d\}$可以表示为非负象限和原点的Cartesian乘积在仿射函数$f(x)=(b-Ax,d-Cx)$下的原象

      $\{x|Ax\preceq b, Cx = d\} = \{x|f(x)\in {\R}^m_+ ×\{0\}\}$

    • 线性矩阵不等式(LMI)

      $A(x)=x_1A_1+…+x_nA_n \preceq B,A_i,B\in S^m$

      其解为：$\{x|A(x) \preceq B\}\to$是凸集

      是半正定锥在由$f(x)=B-Ax$给定的仿射映射$f:{\R}^n\to{S}^m$下的原象

    透视函数和线性分式函数

    • 透视函数：$P:{\R}^{n+1}\to {\R}^n\iff P(z,t) = \frac{z}{t}$,dom $P={\R}^n×{\R}_{++}$

      透视函数对向量进行伸缩或规范化——将其最后一维分量置为1并舍弃

      具有保凸性：

      • 若$C\in$ dom P是凸的，其象$P(C)=\{P(x)|x\in C\}$也是凸的
      • 若$C\in {\R}^n$是凸的，其逆象$P^{-1}(C)=\{(x,t)\in {\R}^{n+1}|\frac{x}{t}\in C, t \ge 0\}$

      小孔成像原理——通过小孔看凸的物体还是凸的

    • 线性分式函数：

      函数$g：{\R}^n\to{\R}^{m+1}$是仿射的

      ​ $g(x) = \left[ \begin{matrix} A \ c^T \end{matrix} \right]x + \left[ \begin{matrix} b\ d \end{matrix} \right]$

      ​ $A\in {\R}^{m×n},b\in{\R}^m,c\in{\R}^n,d\in{\R}$,

​ 函数$f = P\circ g,f:{\R}^n\to {\R}^m\iff$ $f(x)=(Ax+b)/(c^Tx+d)$, dom $f = {x|c^Tx+d>0}$，成为线性分式（或投射）函数

由透视函数和仿射函数复合而成

若$c=0,d>0$，则$f$的定义域为${\R}^n$，$f$是仿射函数——仿射和线性函数为特殊的线性分式函数

利用矩阵表示:

用Q左乘$(x,1)$,即可得到$(Ax+b,c^Tx+d)$,继而用透视函数$P$作用于之上,即可得到$(f(x),1)$,$f(x) = \frac{Ax+b}{c^Tx+d}$

 具有保凸性:
  • 若$C$是凸的且$\{c^Tx+d>0 ~for ~x \in C\}$,则$f(C)=\{\frac{Ax+b}{c^Tx+d}|x\in C\}$是凸的
  • 若$C\in {\R}^m是凸的,则其逆象f^{-1}(C)=\{x|\frac{Ax+b}{c^Tx+d}\in C\}$是凸的

广义不等式

  • 正常锥:锥$K\subset {\R^n}$为正常锥,若$K$满足以下条件

    • $K$是凸的
    • $K$是闭的
    • $K$是实心的,内部非空
    • $K$是尖的$\iff$单向的,不包含直线$\iff$$x\in K,-x\in K \Rightarrow x=0$

    利用锥$K$来定义广义不等式: $x \preceq_K y \iff y-x \in K$

    • 严格偏序关系: $x \prec_K y \iff y-x \in$ int K

    并不是任意两个元素都可比,存在两个元素之前不存在大小关系的情况

  • 非负象限和分量不等式:

    • 正常锥$K={\R}^n_+$
    • $x \preceq_K y \iff x_i \le y_i, i = 1,…,n$
    • $x \prec_K y \iff x_i < y_i, i = 1,…,n$

  • 半正定锥和矩阵不等式

    • 正常锥$K = {S}^n_+$
    • $X \preceq_K Y \iff Y-X ~is~PSD $
    • $X \prec_K Y \iff Y-X ~is~positive ~definite $

  • 广义不等式的性质

    • 加法保序性
    • 传递信
    • 非负数乘保序性
    • 自反性
    • 反对称性
    • 极限运算保序性

    严格广义不等式的性质:

    • 满足严格一定满足广义
    • 严格+广义$\to$严格
    • 严格+数乘($\alpha>0$)$\to$严格
    • $x \nprec_k x$
    • 若$x\prec_k y$,对于足够小的$u,v$有$x+u\prec_ky+v$

  • 最小元:$x\in S$ is the minimum element$\iff$ $\forall y \in S, 满足x\preceq_k y$

    $S\subset x+ K$

    若最小元存在,则其唯一

  • 极小元:$x\in S $ is a minimal element $\iff$ if $y\in S,y\preceq_K x$ only if $y = x$

    $(x-K)\cap S = \{x\}$

    极小元可能有多个

  • 同理可定义极大元和最大元

entry.title: The-Log-of-Fifth-Week
entry.content:
Dear Diary:
This is a strange week. I suffered a lot because of my toothache. On 4th October, I went to the hospital to have an exmination of my wisdom tooth. After my hesitation for a while, I decided to have it extracted in the afternoon. The operation was such a terriable experience which I would never want to experience it again. For the most part of the operation, I was anaesthetic and could not feel the pain of the extration. However, the strange structure of my tooth makes the process more complex. After about 90min, my wisdom tooth was extracted. Unfortunately, I became more conscious and I could feel the pain. So when the dentist sew my wound, it was extreme painful, which made me cry. That night, I also went to the hospital to receive some additional medicine. Even I returned campus, I went to the hospital for infusion for several days which took me a lot of time and decreased my effiency of study. Another thing that disappointed me is that my Apple Pencil broke, so I had to buy a new one which felt more smooth.
For the other things, I had visited my professor and decided on my task

entry.title: Optimization Methods Notes1
entry.content:
[Optimization Methods]——Notes 1

数学补充——分析

  • 内部：对于$x\in C\subset \R^n$,若存在$\epsilon>0$满足:$\{y|~||y-x||_2 \le \epsilon\}\subset C$,称$x$为$C$的内点，$C$的所有内点组成$C$的内部，记为int C
  • 开集：若int C = C,则称C为开集
  • 闭集：若$C\subset \R^n$的补集$R^n$ $C$ = $\{x\in\R|x otin C\}$是开集，则称$C$为闭集
  • 闭包：集合$C$的闭包定义为：cl C = $\R^n$ int($\R^n$ C)——$C$的补集的内部的补集

点$x$属于$C$的条件为：对与每一个$\epsilon>0, \exist y \in C$满足$||x-y||_2 \le \epsilon$

利用收敛序列和极限点的观点：

  • 集合$C$是闭集$\iff$它包含它的每个收敛序列的极限点
  • $C$的闭包是$C$的所有收敛序列的极限点组成的集合
  • 边界：bd C = cl C int C

边界点$x$的性质：

  • 对所有$\epsilon > 0$,存在$y\in C$和$z otin C$满足$||y-x||_2\le\epsilon,||z-x||_2\le \epsilon$

集合$C$是闭集的条件为：bd C $\subset C$

集合$C$是开集的条件为：$C igcap$ bd C = $\emptyset$

仿射集合

  • 若通过集合C中的任意两点的直线仍然在集合C中，则称集合C是仿射的。

仿射组合：$ heta_1+…+ heta_k = 1$,$ heta_1x_1+…+ heta_kx_k$称为$x_1…x_k$的仿射组合。

线性方程组的解集是一个仿射集合，$C=\{x|Ax=b\}$,与仿射集合C相关联的子空间就是A的零空间

  • 零空间：算子$A$的零空间是$Av = 0$的所有解$v$的集合
  • 子空间：C是仿射集合且$x_0\in C$,则集合$V=C-x_0=\{x-x_0|x\in C\}$,是一个子空间，关于加法和数乘封闭。

同理：仿射集合C可以表示为：$C=V+x_0=\{v+x_0|v\in V\}$

  • 仿射包：集合$C\subset R^n$中的点的所有仿射组合组成的集合称为$C$的仿射包，即为aff C

aff C = $\{ heta_1x_1+…+ heta_kx_k|x_1,…,x_k \in C, heta_1+…+ heta_k=1\}$

  • 仿射包是包含$C$的最小仿射集合。
  • 相对内部：集合$C$的相对内部为它相对于aff C的内部，记为relint C，即：relint C = $\{x\in C|B(x,r) igcap$aff C $\subset C$ 对于某些$r>0\}$
  • 相对边界：cl C relint C——集合$C$的闭包除去集合$C$的相对边界

凸集

  • 凸集：集合$C$被称为凸集$\iff orall x_1,x_2\in C$和满足$0\le heta\le1$的$ heta$都有$ heta x_1+(1- heta)x_2 \in C$

仿射集合一定是凸集

凸组合：$ heta_1x_1+…+ heta_kx_k$,为$x_1,…,x_k$的一个凸组合，其中$ heta_1+…+ heta_k=1$且$ heta_i \ge 0, i = 1,…,k$

一个集合是凸集$\iff$集合包含其中所有点的凸组合

  • 凸包：集合$C$中所有的的凸组合的集合称为其凸包，记为conv C，

conv C = $\{ heta_1x_1+…+ heta_kx_k|x_i\in C, heta_i\ge0, i = 1,…,k, heta_1+…+ heta_k = 1\}$

凸包conv C总是凸的，它是包含$C$的最小凸集

锥

  • 锥：若对任意$x\in C$和$ heta \ge 0$, 都有$ heta x \in C$,则将集合$C$称为锥或非负其次。
  • 凸锥：若$C$是锥且$C$是凸的，则称$C$为凸锥$\iff$ $ orall x_1,x_2\in C和 heta_1, heta_2 \ge0,有 heta_1x_1+ heta_2x_2 \in C$

锥组合（非负线性组合）：$ heta_1x_1+…+ heta_kx_k, heta_1,…, heta_k \ge 0$形式的点称为$x_1,…,x_k$的锥组合

集合$C$是凸锥$\iff$它包含其元素的所有锥组合

  • 锥包：集合$C$的所有锥组合的集合：$\{ heta_1x_1+…+ heta_kx_k | x_i \in C, heta_i \ge 0, i = 1,…,k\}$

集合$C$的锥包是集合$C$的最小的凸锥

凸集的例子

  • $\emptyset$、单点集$\{x_0\}$、全空间$\R^n$
  • 直线是仿射的，通过零点的直线是凸锥
  • 线段是凸的但不是仿射的
  • 射线：$\{x_0+ heta v| heta \ge 0\}$ ，$v e 0$ 的集合是凸的，但不仿射；若$v=0$,则其是凸锥
  • 任意子空间是仿射的、凸锥

  • 群：一个集合和定义在该集合上的操作的组合若满足下列条件则称为群

    • 在该操作上的封闭性

    • 操作的结合律

    • 集合中存在不变元

    • 集合中存在逆元

      若额外满足操作的交换律则称为Abelian Group

  • 向量空间：一个集合、定义在集合内部元素之间的操作和与定义在集合中元素与外部集合元素之间的操作组合（e.g. 内部：加法；外部：数乘）

    • 除去外部操作的得到的群是Abelian Group

    • 对于外部操作满足分配律和结合律

    • 对于外部操作也存在不变元

  • 向量子空间：$V = (\cal V,+,·)$是向量空间，集合$\cal U \subset \cal V$且$\cal U e \emptyset$，$U=(\cal U,+,·)$称为$V$的向量子空间,记为$U\subset V$,如果以下条件满足：

    • $U$关于$\cal U ×\cal U$、$\R × \cal U$封闭
    • $0 \in \cal U$

  • 关于子空间和向量空间的一些性质：

    • 对任一向量空间$V$，其自身$V$和$\{0\}$都是其子空间
    • 子空间至少要包含零元($0$)

超平面和半空间

  • 超平面：具有如下形式的集合$\{x|a^Tx=b\}$,$a\in\R^n,a e 0,b\in \R$ $\iff$ $\{x|a^T(x-x_0)=0\} = x_0+a^{ ot}$,$x_0$为超平面上任意一点

$a^{ ot}$表示$a$的正交补，即与$a$正交的向量的集合：$a^{ ot}=\{v|a^Tv=0\}$

超平面由偏移$x_0$加上所有正交于法向量$a$的向量构成。

  • 半空间：一个超平面将$\R^n$划分为两个半空间：$\{x|a^Tx\le b\},a e 0\iff \{x|a^T(x-x_0)\le 0\}$,$x_0$是超平面上的任意一点。

半空间是凸的但不是仿射的

  • 若半空间为$\{x|a^Tx\le b\}$
    • 半空间的边界——超平面$\{x|a^Tx=b\}$
    • 半空间的内部——开半空间$\{x|a^Tx<b\}$

球和椭球

  • 球：

    $B(x_c,r)=\{x|~||x-x_c||_2\le r^2\} = \{x|(x-x_c)^T(x-x_c)\le r^2\} = \{x_c+ru~|~||u||_2\le 1\}$

$向量x_c$是球心，$标量r$是半径，$B(x_c,r)$表示所有距离$x_c$不超过$r$的所有点的集合

球是凸集

  • 椭球：

​ $\varepsilon = \{x|(x-x_c)^TP^{-1}(x-x_c)\le1\} = \{x_c+Au~|~||u||_2 \le 1\}$

$x_c\in \R^n$是椭球中心，$P=P^T\succ 0$,即$P$是对称正定矩阵——决定了椭球从$x_c$向各个方向的拓展幅度,半轴长为$\sqrt\lambda_i$

$\varepsilon = \{x_c+Au~|~||u||_2 \le 1\}$，其中可以假设$A=P^{ rac{1}{2}}$是对称正定的，当$A$为对称半正定矩阵，但奇异时，集合称为退化的椭球，仿射维数为$A$的秩。

退化的椭球也是凸的

范数球和范数锥

  • 范数球：$\{x~|~||x-x_c|| \le r\}$

    范数球是凸的

  • 范数锥：$C=\{(x,t)~|~||x||\le t $ \} $\subset \R^{n+1}$

    范数锥是一个凸锥

    • 二阶锥：

    $C=\{(x,t)\in \R^{n+1}|~||x||_2 \le t$}$\iff x^2-t^2 \le 0, t \ge 0$

多面体和单纯形

  • 多面体：$\cal P = \{x|a_j^Tx\le b_j\, j = 1,…,m,c_j^Tx=d_j,j=1,…,p\}$

    多面体对应有限个线性不等式和等式的解集

    一系列半空间和超平面的交集

    • 矩阵表示：

      $\cal P = \{x|Ax \preceq b, Cx = d\}$

    • $u \preceq v \iff orall i,~ u_i \preceq v_i $

  • 单纯形：设$k+1$个点$v_0,….,v_k\in \R^n$仿射独立，那么这些点决定了一个单纯形：

    C = conv $\{v_0,…,v_k\}$=$\{ heta_0v_0+…+ heta_kv_k~|~ heta \succeq 0, 1^T heta = 1\}$

    • 仿射独立：$k+1$个点$v_0,…,v_k\in \R^n$仿射独立，即，$v_1-v_0,…,v_k-v_0$线性独立

    单纯形是一类重要的多面体。

    • 上述单纯形的仿射维数为$k$,也成为$\R^n$空间的$k$维单纯形。

  • 常见的单纯形：

    • 一维单纯形——线段

    • 二维单纯形——三角形及其内部

    • 三维单纯形——四面体

    • 单位单纯形：零向量$0$和单位向量$\epsilon_1,…\epsilon_n \in \R^n$决定的$n$维单纯形

      $x\succeq0, 1^Tx \le 1$

    • 概率单纯形：单位向量$\epsilon_1,…\epsilon_n \in \R^n$决定的$n-1$维单纯形

      $x\succeq0,1^Tx=1$

      对应$n$个元素的集合的概率分布，$x_i$可理解为第$i$个元素的概率

      单纯形的紧凑表达：$x\in C \iff A_2x = A_2v_0 , y = A_1x-A_1v_0$满足$y\succeq 0$ 和$1^Ty \le 1$,即：

  • 半正定锥：

​ 集合$S^n_+$是一个凸锥$\iff$ 若$ heta_1, heta_2 \ge 0$,且$A,B\in S^n_+$,有$ heta_1A+ heta_2B\in S^n_+$

根据半正定的定义：$ orall x\in \R^n,若A\succeq0,B\succeq 0$，且$ heta_1, heta_2 \ge 0$,有

$S^n=\{X\in \R^{n×n}|X=X^T\}$——n×n的对称矩阵

$S^n_+=\{X\in S^n|x\succeq 0\}$——半正定对称矩阵

$S^n_{++} = \{X\in S^n|X\succeq0\}$——正定对称矩阵

entry.title: The Log of Fourth Week
entry.content:
Dear Diary:

I had my first date with my dear angel on the Mid-Autumn Festival this week. That day was such an unforgettable day in my whole life. I cherish every second of that day and want to store the memories into my precious crystal box of my memory.

I was so excited and nervous when she was getting close and waved to me at the subway station. Just like an angel who was coming to me, she was such a cute and adorable girl holding a little package in front of her chest. Actually, I was so nervous that it was completely blank in my brain and I just walked towards her and greeted her. I should have done that in a more romantic way! Luckily, then a lot of more romantic moments came as following.

  • When she sitting next to me in the little room watching the documentary about history, she tried to move her whole body onto the step. However, when she noticed I was watching her, she seemed shy and nervous. At that moment, I was nearly melted by her cute behavior. I had such a strong feeling to take her into my arms and hug her. But I was so nervous and shy.
  • After the picnic, we lied close to each other on the lawn with our heads together. It must be in dreams——My angel was lying next to me. We watched the sky and clouds and listened to music. Haha, I even sang my favorite songs to her——how can I overcame my extreme shyness? My angel said she likes my song(Haha, I hope it is true)!

  • When the buses and cars passed us, I hold her in my arms and stood still waiting for the cars to leave. I had the feeling that I was protecting my angel!——It was such a wonderful feeling. With her in my arms, the vision that I covered her with my invisible huge wings, hahaha! And I want to use my invisible wings to protect her for all the time to come.

  • Actually, when she was taking off her mask, maybe I was as nervous as her because I was wondering what my angel tried to hide from me. Haha, I guessed some possible reasons which turns to be ridiculous. It turns out that she was as adorable and cute as before without mask and I wanted to hold her tightly and told her once and once again——I love her.

The $W$ is a template that has a corresponding weight of each pixel in the input image. After the calculating, we will get the score of each class, and the score of the true class should be the highest.

entry.content:
数字图像处理（第二讲：数字图像基础）

视觉感知要素

人眼

结构

  • 虹膜：控制进入眼的光量
  • 视网膜：物体在视网膜上成像
  • 晶状体：光线通过晶状体进入眼睛，晶状体可调节焦距
  • 中央凹(concavity)：视网膜上对颜色/细节敏感的区域

特点

  • 成像焦距：14-17mm

  • 亮度适应：

  • 人眼可感知的光强度范围很广——暗视觉和亮视觉两种不同感知细胞的感光范围所构成的感光范围很广

  • 人眼可以同时分辨的强度范围有限——给定条件下，仅有一定的感知范围，超出的部分是无法区分颜色的

    人眼的错觉和欺骗性

  • 马赫带效应：亮度条带交界处发生灰度的上冲和下冲

  • 与不同亮度对比：与不同亮度对比后，人眼对同一亮度的感知有所不同

  • 视错觉：平行，长短

    光和电磁波谱

    电磁波谱

  • $波长\lambda = \frac{光速c}{频率\nu}$

  • $能量E=普朗克常数h×频率\nu$

    可感知的光

    物体的颜色：

  • 物体均匀反射：呈白色

  • 反射特定光：呈该颜色

    单色光：

  • 没有颜色的光

  • 唯一属性：强度

  • 对单色光的感知：黑色（最暗）、灰色、白色（最亮）

  • 灰度：表示强度的数值

  • 单色图即灰度图像

    彩色光：

  • 范围：0.43-0.79mm的电磁波

  • 辐射（radiance）：能量（瓦特）
  • 光强（luminance）：感知的能量（流明）

  • 亮度（brightness）：主观描绘

  • 观测精度:波长需要小于物体尺寸才可观察

    图像感知和获取

    图像产生

    传感器

  • 将照射能量变化为数字图像

  • 分类：

    • 单个传感器：光二极管
    • 条带传感器：CT、核磁共振
    • 阵列传感器：数码相机、摄像机

    图像形成模型

  • 二维函数$f(x,y)=i(x,y)r(x,y):0<f(x,y)<\infty$

  • 入射分量：$0<i(x,y)<\infty$——表征入射光强度
  • 反射分量：$0<r(x,y)<1$——表征反射率

  • 投射系数：表征光穿透物体的程度

    灰度范围

  • 单色图像的灰度值：$L_{min} \le l \le L_{max}$

    ​ 最小值：$L_{min}=i_{min}r_{min}$

    ​ 最大值：$L_{max}=i_{max}r_{max}$

  • 灰度范围：

    • [$L_{min},L_{max}$]
    • 归一化：[0, L-1]
    • 0表示黑色，$L-1$表示白色，其余为灰色

图像取样和量化

基本概念

  • 目的：把连续图像转换为数字图像
  • 取样：对坐标进行数字化
  • 量化：对幅值进行数字化

表示数字图像

  • 二维数组$f(x,y)$:

    二维数组中每个元素的值为像素

    • 包含$M$行，$N$列
    • $x$=0,1,2,…,$M$-1
    • $y$=0,1,2,…,$N$-1
    • $f(x,y)$表示在$(x,y)$处的值

  • 空间域

    • 图像坐标所张成的实平面

  • 空间坐标

    • $x$和$y$

  • 灰度级数$L=2^k,k\in Z$

    • 灰度值$[0,L-1]$内的整数

  • 动态范围：

    • $\frac{最大可检测灰度}{最小可检测灰度}$

  • 图像的对比度：

    • 图像内最高和最低灰度之间的差值
    • 动态范围光、对比度高

存储数字图像

  • 存储数字图像的比特数:$b=M×N×k$
  • $k$比特图像：图像有$2^k$个灰度级别时，称为$k$比特图像

分辨率

  • 空间分辨率：

    • 图像中可辨别的最小细节的度量
    • 单位距离线对数
    • 单位距离点数
      • 单位英尺点数（dpi）
    • 空间单位
      • 图像像素大小并不能表示清晰程度
      • 像素大小可反映设备成像能力
    • 空间分辨率过低：图片失真

  • 灰度分辨率

    • 灰度级别中可体现的最小变化
      • 灰度级别通常是2的整数次幂
    • 用比特数表示灰度分辨率
      • 256个灰度级别意味着8比特分辨率
    • 比特数过低，灰度分辨率过低：出现伪轮廓

  • 空间、灰度分辨率的联合影响：

    • 等偏爱曲线：

      • 沿等偏爱曲线，人对画质的感受不变
      • 图像所需细节越多，需要的比特数越少（伪轮廓被大量细节掩盖）
      • 增加空间分辨率，可适当降低比特数

最佳量化

最佳量化

  • 使量化误差最小的量化方法

    • 使用均方误差量化质量

  • 计算过程

    • $Z、q$分别代表图像灰度和其量化值
    • $p(Z)$为像素灰度概率密度函数
    • $Z$的取值范围为$[H_1,H_2]$, 量化层数为$K$
    • 均方误差

    即将图像真实灰度为$[Z_k,Z_{k+1}]$的点，用离散量化值$q_k$代替，$p(Z)$事先已知，求$Z_i,i\in[i,K+1],q_i,i\in[1,K]$,令均方误差最小

  • 优化问题：

图像内插

  • 用已知数据来估计未知位置的数值

    • 放大：E.g. 将4*4的图片放大为5*5的图片

      • 最近邻内插：
  - 使用邻近像素作为赋值  - 将4\*4的图片和5\*5的图片化为相同图像大小，然后旋转4\*4图片中最近的点作为5\*5图片中的点。  - 该方法不平滑，失真- 双线性内插：  - 由相邻象个像素点的灰度值加权的到
  - 拓展到二位：做3次双线性内插

Lecture 2

Image Classification

Problem:

  • Semantic gap: how to get a cat from these pixels value

Challenges:

  • Illumination
  • Deformation
  • Occlusion
  • Background Cluster
  • Intraclass variation

It is such a difficult and challenging problem for computer science.

Attempts:

  • Huble and Wisel: Edge Detection

  • Data-Driven Approach:

    • Collect a dataset of images and labels
    • Use Machine Learning to train a classifier
    • Evaluate the classifier on new images

  • First classifier: Nearest Neighbor

    • train: Memorize all data and labels
    • test: Predict the label of the most similar training image
    • Dataset: CIFAR10
    • Distance Metric to compare images：
      • L1 Distance: Manhattan distance: $d_1(I_1,I_2)=\sum|I_1^p,I_2^p|$. If you know some features have significant meaning. This has coordinate-dependent.
      • L2 Distance: Euclidean distance: $d_2(I_1,I_2)=\sqrt{\sum(I_1^p-I_2^p)^2}$If you don’t know the meaning of the features

  • K-Nearest Neighbors:

    • Take a majority vote among the K closest points.

    • This can smooth the decision boundary.

    • White region: no majority, just randomly choose a label.

    • The choices:

      • the values of K

      • the best distance

      • The above two are hyperparameters.

    • How to set the hyperparameters:

      • #Idea1: Choose hyperparameters that work best on the data—-a very bad idea.
      • #Idea2: Split data into train and test, choose hyperparameters that work best on test data—-no idea how algorithm will perform on new data
      • #Idea3: Split data into train, validation, and test, choose hyperparameters on validation and evaluate on test. Train on the training data, evaluate the model on validation data and pick the set of hyperparameters that performs best on the validation sets. Finally, take the best classifier to work on the test set, the accuracy is the ones that should be on the report or paper.
      • #Idea4: Cross-validation: Split the training data into several folds. Each time we select a fold as a validation set and use others as training data. After a cycle , we calculate the average of the accuracy to represent the performance and select the hyperparameters.
    • The K-Nearest Neighbor on images never used.
      • Very slow.
      • L1 or L2 distance is not a good way to represent pictures.
      • Curse of dimensionality —- exponetial.

Linear Classifier

  • The linear classifier is the basement of neural networks.

  • Linear classifier is a parametric model.

  • $f(x,W)$: the $W$ is the parameters metric.

  • $f(x,W)=Wx+b$: $f(x,W)~is~10*1$

  • Problem: this model can just construct a single template for each class which will perform bad with images with different views.

  • There are cases that we can not get just got a hyperplane two separate the two classes.

Two viewpoints:

  • The idea of high dimensional points in the plane.
  • Actually looking at concrete images.
  • We need to flip back and forth from the above two viewpoints.

entry.content:
#Dynamic Programming:动态规划

动态规划问题概述：

  • 动态规划用于在约束条件下找到问题的最优解，其思路为首先解决子问题，再逐步解决大问题。
  • 能用动态规划求解问题的前提是：每个子问题都是独立且离散的，不能存在依赖关系
  • 每种动态规划解决方案都涉及网络，网络的单元格中的值通常就是需要优化的值。
  • 每个单元格都是问题的子问题，可通过将问题分解为子问题来考虑网络的坐标轴。

背包问题：

  • 问题描述：小偷的背包可装下4磅物品，现有如下三样物品可供盗窃

    • 音响(S)：$3000, 4磅
    • 笔记本电脑(L)：$2000, 3磅
    • 吉他(G)：$1500, 1磅

  • 问题解决：

    • 构建网络，横坐标为背包容量（1磅到4磅）,纵坐标为商品。

    • 按行填充网络

      | | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 |
      | ———- | ———- | ———- | ———- | —————— |
      | 吉他(G) | $1500 G | $1500 G | $1500 G | $1500 G |
      | 音响(S) | $1500 G | $1500 G | $1500 G | $3000 S |
      | 笔电(L) | $1500 G | $1500 G | $2000 L | $3500 LG |

    • 单元格计算方法：Max(上一个单元格的值, 装入当前商品的价值+剩余空间的价值)

    • 由网格得出最优解为电脑+吉他。

动态规划网络的特点及要求：

  • 行的排列顺序不影响最终结果。
  • 若对于可取走一部分的商品，如大米，豆类等散称物品，动态规划无法求解（贪婪算法可求解）。
  • 横坐标中子背包的容量粒度取决于质量最小的商品。

最长公子串问题：

  • 问题描述：求解两个序列中最长的连续子串。

  • 问题解决：

    • 网格坐标：分别为两个子串

    • 单元格计算：若单元格所在横纵坐标的子串相同，则单元格值为右上角单元格值加1，否则为0。

    • 结果：最长子串长度为网格所有单元格值中的最大值。

最长公共子序列问题：

  • 问题描述：求解两个序列中的最长公共子序列（除去了连续的要求）

  • 问题解决：

    • 网格坐标：分别为两个子串

    • 单元格计算：若单元格所在横纵坐标的子串相同，则单元格值为右上角单元格值加1，否则为该单元格左边和上边单元格值中较大的那一个。

    • 结果：最长公共子序列长度为网格所有单元格值中的最大值。

entry.title: Class4-Opening the Box Model
entry.content:
#Class4-Opening the Box Model

Display

  • How the elements are displayed is determined by their display property, including block,inline,inline-block and none.

Box Model

  • In HTML&CSS, each element is considered as a rectangular box.

  • The box model has the following properties:

    • width
    • height
    • padding
    • border
    • margin

  • The calculation of the total width or height:

    $margin*2 + border*2+padding*2+width/height$

Some Tips:

  • The width and height only make sense to non-inline elements, because the inline elements need to accommodate their content and size.

  • The padding and margin both leave some blank space. The padding is affiliated to the element itself and shares the background with the element, while the margin is affiliated to the parental element of the element and shares the background with the parent’s background.

  • The margins only work horizontally—-left and right on inline-level elements. Meanwhile, the paddings work on all sides of inline-level elements. Both of them work normally on non-inline elements.

  • Some ways to declare margin or padding.

    • The borders have similar properties. However, the have the properties of styles(solide, dashed, dotted, none) and colors(e.g. #949599).

    • We can also round the corners of the border:

    • There are also some ways for us to redefine the calculation of our box model, which is called box-sizing.

      • content box: the value we set is just the size of the content box, we must add the length and width of margin, padding and border.
      • padding box: the value we set includes the size of padding, so we just need to add the length and width of margin and border.
      • border box: the value we set is just the size of our element and we just need to add the length and width of margin.

    • To choose the box-sizing, sometimes we need to add the vendor prefix to support browser-specific properties & values in CSS3.

entry.title: Greedy Algorithm： 贪婪算法
entry.content:
#Greedy Algorithm： 贪婪算法

贪婪算法的相关概念

算法思路
  • 每一步选择局部最优解
  • 最终得到全局最优解
Example：
  • 旅游问题：每次选择可在剩余时间内旅游完的价值量最高的景点。——非最优解
  • 卡车存储空间问题：每次选择卡车剩余空间中可装载的最大的物品。——非最优解

近似算法

贪婪算法解不可解问题
  • 对于某些问题，随着元素的数目增多，运算量会急剧增加从而导致不可解。
  • 通常采用贪婪算法作为近似算法（Approximation Algorithm）去得到非常接近的解。
近似算法的评价标准
  • 速度有多快
  • 得到的解与最优解的接近程度

集合覆盖问题

广播节目覆盖问题：
  • 问题描述：有许多个电台（n），每个电台覆盖一定数量的州，想要举办一个广播节目让全美所有州都能收听，求最小需要投放广播节目的电台集合。
  • 基本思路：列出所有可能的广播台的集合，计算他们所覆盖的州，找到能覆盖所有州的最小广播台的集合。
  • 存在的困难：对于n个电台而言，有$2^n$种可能的集合数目，随着电台数目增加，所需的计算量呈指数增长，时间复杂度为$O(2^n)$。
  • 贪婪算法的近似：每次选择一个能覆盖最多未覆盖州的电台，直到覆盖所有州。
  • 代码：

旅行商问题

  • 问题描述：一个旅行商要前往几个城市，同时要确保时间最短，如何规划行程。

  • 基本思路：列出所有可能的线路并计算其花费时间，选择花费时间最短的那一条线路。

  • 存在的困难：随着城市数目增加，例如$n$个城市，共有$n!$种不同的线路，计算量急剧增加，算法的时间复杂度为$O(n!)$。

  • 贪婪算法的近似：任选一起点，每一步选择距离最近的城市前往。

  • 其他补充说明：

  • 对于同一城市之间的往返，其花费时间可能不同。
    • 对于图算法中的最短路径算法，若指定需要经过某几个节点也便转化成了旅行商问题。

NP完全问题

  • 简单定义：以难解著称的问题。

  • 补充说明：NP完全问题没有办法准确判别，但可根据以下蛛丝马迹判断：

    • 元素较少时，运算速度很快，元素数量增加时，速度变得非常慢。
    • 涉及“所有组合”的问题，通常是NP完全问题。
    • 不能将问题分成小问题，必须考虑各种可能的情况，这可能是NP完全问题。
    • 问题涉及序列且难以解决，这可能是NP完全问题。
    • 问题涉及集合且难以解决，这可能是NP完全问题。
    • 问题可转换为集合覆盖或旅行商问题，肯定是NP完全问题。

entry.title: Dijkstra's Algorithm:狄克斯特拉算法
entry.content:
#Dijkstra’s Algorithm:狄克斯特拉算法

加权图

  • 对于每一条边都有一个对应的数字的图称为加权图。
  • 每一条边对应的数字称为权重。
  • 计算非加权图的最短路径可使用广度优先搜索，对于加权图的最短路径，应使用狄克斯特拉算法

环

  • 在有向图中，两个节点相互指向则会成环，相当于无向图中两个节点的连接（无向图意味着两个节点互相指向对方，其实就是环）。
  • 在有向图的路径中，若包含环则会导致路径增加，因最短路径。
  • 狄克斯特拉算法仅适用于有向无环图（Direct Acyclic Graph， DAG）
  • 对于存在负权边的图，狄克斯特拉算法也不适用，应选用贝尔曼-福德算法（Bellman-Ford Algorithm）。

狄克斯特拉算法

算法思想：
  1. 找出最便宜的节点，即在最短时间内前往的节点。
  2. 对于该节点的邻居节点，检查是否有前往他们的更短路径，若有，就更新其开销
  3. 重复上述过程，对图中的每一个节点都执行上述操作
  4. 回溯，计算最终路径

找到途中最便宜的节点，并确保没有到该节点更便宜的路径。

需要的数据结构
  • 图的表示（Graph）——散列表：包含每一条边的权值
  • 已有开销（Costs）——散列表：从初始节点开始，未知开销均初始化为$+\infin$
  • 父节点（Parents）——散列表：用于记录路径，便于回溯追踪起点到终点的路径
  • 已探索集（Closed）——数组：用于记录已探索过的，即已找到最便宜路径的节点

entry.title: Class3:Getting to Know CSS
entry.content:
#Class3:Getting to Know CSS

Overview

  • The CSS facilitate us to add layout and styles to our pages or website and allow us to share styles among elements or pages.
  • The types and orders of the selectors can effect differently on the pages or elements.
  • There are many kinds of ways to define colors or lengths.

The Cascade

What does cascade mean?

  • Within CSS, all styles cascade from the top of a style sheet to the bottom, allowing different styles to be added or overwritten as the style sheet progresses.
  • Generally, the selectors appears later will overwrite the former ones. Here are some examples:

Calculating Specificity

  • Different types of selectors has different specificity weights:

    ID selector > class selector > type selector

    ​ 1-0-0 > 0-1-0 > 0-0-1

  • The selector with higher specificity weights will overwrite the lower ones even they appears earlier. Here is an example:

Combining Selectors

  • We can combine different types of selectors together to select specific elements. For example:
  • The selector the closest to the { is the key selector while the selectors before it are prequalifiers.
  • To calculate the specificity of combined selectors, we just add each members’ specificity weights in each bits. For example, the .hotdog p: 0-1-0 + 0-0-1 = 0-1-1

​ .hotdog p.mustard:0-1-0 + 0-0-1 + 0-1-0 = 0-2-1

​ So .hotdog p.mustard's specificity weight > .hotdog p's specificity weight.

Layering Styles with Multiple Classes

  • In order to maintain the cascade of our page or websites, we should keep the specificity weights of our selectors low while still share similar styles from element to element.
  • The elements in HTML can has more than one class attribute which are separated with space, by which we can place certain styles all elements and overwrite some of them. Here is the examples:

Common CSS Property Values

Four ways to represent colors:

Hexadecimal Colors

  • We use six bit of hexadecimal digit to represent the color, the first two bits stand for the red channel, the last two bits stand for blue channel and the middle two bits stand for green channel.
  • If the two bits are the same in the same channel, we can just use three bits of hexadecimal digit to represent them.

RGB & RGBa Colors

  • In RGB Colors, we just rewrite the representation of the color to the following format: rgb(###, ###, ###), where ### stands for a number between 0~255.
  • In RGBa Colors, we add an fourth value $\alpha$, whose number is between 0-1, which stands for the transparency of the color.

HSL & HSLa Colors

  • In HSL Colors, we still have three values. However, the first one —hue, is between 0-360, which identifies the degree of a color on the color wheel. The second one—saturation is between 0~100%, which identifies how saturated with color the hue is. The third one—lightness, identifies how dark or light the hue value is, which is between 0~100% with 0 stands for completely black and 100% stands for completely white. The format is this: hsl(###, ###, ###)
  • In HSLa Colors, we just add a fourth value which stands for the transparency of the color.

The ways to represent length

  • There are two different ways to represent length in page or website——Absolute Length & Relative Length

Absolute Lengths

  • The simplest length representation. The length are fixed to a physical measurement
  • Pixel is the most common one, which is noted as px.
  • This kind of representation lacks flexibility among different display devices.

Relative Lengths

  • The relative lengths are determined according to some other fixed length.

Percentages

  • The length of the element is determined by their parent element.
  • This representation is very helpful in designing a web page’s layout.

Em

  • The length is calculated by comparison of the font size.
  • This is very useful in designing a textbox.

entry.title: Class2:Getting to Know HTML
entry.content:
#Class2:Getting to Know HTML

Basic Semantics

Overview

Semantics:

  • The semantics in HTML gives the content of the page meaning of defines the structure of the page.

Divisions & Spans

Commons:

  • <div>s <span>s are both generic containers which has no overarching meaning.
  • <div>s <span>s are often used to apply targeted styles to a contained set of content.

Differences:

  • A <div> is a block-level element that is commonly used to identify large groupings of content, and which helps to build a web page’s layout and design.
  • A <span>, on the other hand, is an inline-level element commonly used to identify smaller groupings of text within a block-level element.

Block vs. Inline Elements

Headings

  • Headings are block-level elements which have six different ranks:

  • This ranks shows the order of the content and their relevance.

Paragraphs

  • Paragraphs are block-level elements which store some information of the website.

Text: Bold

Two ways:

  • <strong>: makes text bold and place a strong importance on it.
  • <b>: just makes the text bold to show them in a different style —— stylistically offset, with no intent to draw intention.

Text: Italicize

Two ways:

  • <em>: is used to place a stressed emphasize on text.

  • <i>: is used to convey text in an alternative voice or tone.

Building Structure

Overview

HTML5:

  • HTML5 introduced some new structurally based elements, which can give meaning to the organization of our pages and improve its structural semantics.

Header

  • <header>: is used to identify the top of a page, article, section, or other segment of a page.
  • This part can contain introductory text, even navigation menu.

Confusion Tips:

  • <header>: a structural element which outlines the heading of a segment of a page.
  • <head>: this element not display on a page and is used to outline metadata.
  • <h1>: is used to designate multiple levels of text headings throughout a page.

Navigation

  • <nav>: is used to identifies a section of major navigational links on a page.
  • These links include links to other pages within this website or to parts of the same web page.

Article

  • <article>: is used to identify a section of independent, self-contained element.

Section

  • <section>: is used to identify a thematic grouping of content.
  • This element is often used to break up the whole page and provide hierarchy. In addition, this element always contains a heading

Aside

  • <aside>: is used to hold contents, such as sidebars or brief explanations.
  • This element is often used to identify content related to the article, such as author etc.

Footer

  • <footer>: is used to identify the closing or end of a page, article or section.

Encoding Special Characters:

&ndash, &mdash, &copy: this are special characters in HTML, and those are how they are encoded.

Hyperlinks

Overview

  • The hyperlinks facilitate the website to provide link which can link to many other websites or other pages or parts within this website.

  • <a href="...">: is used to create hyperlink which is a inline-level element.

Relative & Absolute Paths:

  • Relative Paths: If the link links to other pages of the same website, we can use relative paths in href.
  • Absolute Paths: If the link links to other website, we should use absolute paths in href.

Linking to an Email Address:

  • Email Link: can open the email client and write to the given email address.
  • The format looks like this:
  • mailto: we add the target address here.
  • subject: we add our title of the email here.
  • body: we add our content of the email here.
  • Remark: %20: means space, %0A: means line break

Open Links in a New Window

  • Just add target="_blank" in the <a>.

Linking to Parts of the Same Page

  • Back to Top Button: Just add id="top" to the target part and set href="#top".
